name: Meteor World Actor
description: Meteor World Actor is a visual novel that takes place in the dystopian technopolis country of Seventh Republic, where different diasporic races coexist but tensions run high. Players take on the role of Ruka, a member of the eccentric and outcast 13th Division police force, who uses dubious methods to solve cases. The game features branching plotlines with four different romanceable heroines and non-romanceable subordinates that players can interact with. The game’s atmosphere is tense and sophisticated, with an impressive visual style, jazzy soundtrack, and voice acting.
